text: A fluid coupling or hydraulic coupling or fluid flywheel is a device used to transmit rotating mechanical power.Fluid coupling encyclopedia2.thefreedictionary.com It has been used in automobile transmissions as an alternative to a mechanical clutch. It is simpler than a torque converter, but it does not provide any torque multiplication, so it must be used together with a gearbox. ==References== Category:Engineering
title: Fluid coupling
